short_summary: Request for Proposal regarding the procurement of hydrated lime (chemicals) for the Canadian Government.
description: Request for Proposal for the Procurement of Hydrated Lime.
tags: Full description of this dataset can be seen on the discovery.ariba.com link provided.
full_summary:
=================
### Request for Submission (RFS) Document - Hydrated Lime

**Reference Number**: WS4420073297-Doc4495828331  
**Publication Date**: March 21st, 2024  
**Closing Date for Submissions**: April 24th, 2024 at 14:00 (AST)

### Overview

This Request for Submission document outlines the procurement requirements for the supply of hydrated lime. The selected supplier will provide the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) with high-quality products, ensuring timely and efficient delivery to meet the end-user's needs.

###Scope of Work

The scope of work involves supplying hydrated lime for a period of 3 years, commencing on June 1st, 2024, and ending on June 30th, 2027. Suppliers must be able to provide the required quantity and quality of products, adhering to the specifications outlined in the tender document.

### Procurement Method

This procurement will be conducted through a competitive, open bidding process, with the lowest price being the primary selection criterion.

### Additional Requirements

* Trade agreements: Successful suppliers must sign a contract in compliance with the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), among others.
* Regions of delivery: Nova Scotia.
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* Contact information: MacNeil, Blaine (SPAC/PSPC) at blaine.macneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: April 24th, 2024 at 14:00 (AST).
* Expected contract start date: June 1st, 2024.
* Expected contract end date: June 30th, 2027.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or concerns, please contact MacNeil, Blaine (SPAC/PSPC) at blaine.macneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Document

The full tender document, including specifications, terms, and conditions, can be accessed through the Ariba Discovery portal at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19177867?extsite=MTkxNzc4NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Please note: The original text has been sanitized and rephrased to maintain
